title: It doesn't hurt to know
creator_credit: Ted Robinson, Eve Ash and Seven Dimensions
brief_description: Discusses the symptoms, causes and prevention of P.I.D. - Pelvic Inflammatory Disease, a sexually transmitted infection causing infertility in young women. Stresses the importance of check-ups, the use of condoms and honest communication between partners.
